string-array.name: changelog_build_29
string-array.item: Servers which block ads are now shown in non-playstore builds (including this one!)

string-array.name: changelog_build_30
string-array.item: Added new app icon (thanks to RKBDI)
Added a setting to clear logged queries

string-array.name: changelog_build_31
string-array.item: Fixed the privacy policy not loading
Clarified the blacklist/whitelist text in the notification

string-array.name: changelog_build_32
string-array.item: Added settings to disable the stop/pause buttons of the notification
A notification is now shown if the app crashes and automatic crash reporting is enabled
